title: Allocation Identification
description: Flexible identification structure for allocations with multiple identifier options
$comment: This schema defines different valid combinations of allocation identifiers that can be used across the allocation workflow

allocationIdentification.description: Primary allocation identification number assigned by the system
allocationIdentification.$comment: This is the main identifier used by the central system to track allocations

individualAllocationIdentification.description: Individual allocation number assigned by the participant system
individualAllocationIdentification.$comment: This identifier is used by participants to track allocations in their own systems

previousAllocationIdentification.description: Identifies the control number of a previous allocation related to this one
previousAllocationIdentification.$comment: Used in status messages to reference a previous allocation, especially in correction or replacement scenarios
